post.body: heard you will go bald after six months with Seth ...at least won't go gray that's for sure!
check out Buttons of Hope
you should see the buttons I made of the Farm Sanctuary rescued animals http://twitpic.com/qbzb
http://twitpic.com/pj7y - damn one more thing to admire
@lizkreutz welcome to twitterland
waffle house as good as any, maybe better place "sorting" life's mysteries and other mysteries!
my www.ButtonsofHope.com I make custom photo buttons for people to honor loved ones in events like walkathons etc
radiohead is unlike another band ever so awesome
whispering is sexier!
Lance was amazing
seemed genuinely interested in my Buttons of Hope project very cool and he was super nice and funny! http://twitpic.com/thup
yes saw your twit about CB have lot of friends who use that site amazing what is your story?
test
guess my wife's white chocolate cranberrry cookies wont help - sorry man hang in there
just wanted to say hello -- owe you some communications just am swamped with Twit, FaceBook, Tribes, Blogs you know!??
curious is there anyone out..out.. out..there..there..there... did anyone read my last 3 twits --please show yourselves
I am well past that point BTW
U ever reach point where you just feel like you need, dare say deserve a break JUST ONE....I know there are no "goodie bags" at a Pity Party
http://tiny.cc/ComputerHistoryOf so cool era 1991 documentary telling us how far things have come as of 1991 whoa!
Fascinating History of Computer 5 part documentary http://tiny.cc/ComputerHistoryOf
http://twitpic.com/r6b4 - “I wear my Button of Hope every day because I need to see Janine’s beautiful face smiling back at me each time ...
http://twitpic.com/r6b4 - Project O Button #1 “I wear my Button of Hope every day because I need to see Janine’s beautiful face smiling ...
I twitted this over Thanksgiving if you missed it worth watching the whole thing 15 min Seasonal Cheer for sure http://tiny.cc/GetValidated
http://twitpic.com/qped - Photo button image in honor of LaKeisha Brown end violence learn more http://tiny.cc/LakesheiaBrown
curious what do you think about the photo button images posted here? http://twitpic.com/photos/buttonsofhope
http://twitpic.com/qm1e - Project "O" photo button #1 Janine Kelker killed by a drunk driver buttons made in her honor MADD
http://twitpic.com/qm0u - Project "O" button #4 sent today!
http://twitpic.com/qc4b - Photo button image of young man Julio who is in a tough fight with cancer please think of him
http://twitpic.com/qc2l - 1 more photo button image Farm Sanctuary rescued duck named Matty
http://twitpic.com/qc1z - Photo button image of Farm Sanctuary rescued rooster name Plantain donated 300 buttons
http://twitpic.com/qbzb - Photo button picture of rescued farm animals for Farm Sanctuary funsraiser ~ putting a face on all causes
http://twitpic.com/qbym - Photo button made for a Mom whose son is fighting in Iraq -some pretty happy Iraqi kids!
So So many people twittering about CaringBridge such a an awesome way 4 people to support and honor loved ones, friends, even strangers
off to study a bit and then take my sweet 14 yo daughter Em to lunch and work on her Christmas list (clothes) lucky guy!
have chance today visit my friend 7 yo http://www.caringbridge.org/visit/elliepotvin she's at Disney with Make wish today! smiles all around
welcome to a couple new www.CaringBridge.org followers don't know of a better org serving amazing heroic people 24/7 when they need it most
Ellie little girl on button battling Rhabdomyosarcoma cancer at Disney this week Make a Wish! Livestrong Ellie! http://twitpic.com/sgx1
http://twitpic.com/sgx1 - "I see the button several times a day and I always stop to say a little prayer for Ellie and her family." Rhonda
helping Dad with MAC!
please check out my blog www.behindthebutton.com and www.buttonsofhope.com to see how I am helping people put face on cause
I vote for Operation Gratitude in the Squidoo Twitterdrive for Charity! 1 vote=$1 donated. http://tr.im/24c2 #squidoogives Please VOTE too!
juts realized @lancearmstrong is really twittering how cool is that and to think I got to meet & ride with him few weeks ago in Austin!
like to start conversation about how you to engage motivate inspire people, yourself to raise money for Livestrong, Komen, relay 4 life etc
plan to twit about fundraising issues and event and putting a face on your cause with custom photo buttons -one button at a time!
http://twitpic.com/thvs - Another one of coolest days in life -- he is amazing guy
http://twitpic.com/thup - Rode w/@lancearmstrong at ride fr the Roses Livestrong fundraiser guess all that fundraising did good
